metadata.name: Iran #BW NO.1 #2010
metadata.description:
I am from Iran. For me, in this country, everything is left half-finished. The disintegration of a person under the influence of an unknown environment creates a vague and indeterminate feeling in me.

"Mehdi Hokmfarmaei BW Iran" series was filmed within a year (2010).

This collection includes 50 street images, all of which have just been documented after about 11 years without any manipulation.


A negative physical version will be sent to any collector who buys each piece above 1 ETH.
